text:
**LXQt** is a lightweight desktop built on Qt which partly uses Razor-qt and LXDE components. Made not to get in your way, LXQt will not hang or slow down your system. It is focused on being a classic desktop with a modern look and feel.
**Notable features**
- Cross compatibility with GTK and Qt libs for a integrated desktop. 
- Falls between LXDE and Xfce in bloat and response, while being the latest tech of the two.
**More info**
http://lxqt.org/
